mapper.select: select price from czb_h5_stock where commodity_id = #{commodityId} group by price

select DISTINCT t2.price salePrice, t1.deduction_type deductionType, t1.max_deduction_amount maxDeductionAmount, t2.commodity_id commodityId from czb_integral_deduction_info t1 join czb_h5_stock t2 on t1.commodity_id = t2.price where deduction_type = 6 or deduction_type = 7

select SUM(recharge_amount) from czb_h5_stock where 1 = 1
and commodity_id = #{commodityId, jdbcType = INTEGER}
